events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit and I want to request a refund. Please advise how to proceed with returning the item and getting my money back.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund based on keywords indicating a request for money back and return process.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to assist you through the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for the return?
My order number is 12345678. The jacket is brand new, unused, and still in the original packaging ready for return.

Great! I have initiated the return process for your order 12345678. You will receive a prepaid shipping label via email shortly to return the jacket, and the refund will be processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the item.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and will send the jacket back as soon as I get the shipping label.
The return request is now fully processed, and the shipping label has been sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you have returned the jacket and if your refund was received. Please contact us if you have any questions.
We see your refund has been processed successfully and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
